Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Making personal connections with stories that explore identity and belonging; discussing who they are, where they come from and people in their lives (MH, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Understanding similarities and differences in Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander family structures and family structures in other cultures (MH, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Exploring cultural practices from different cultures, including the cultures of Asia, that are important to individuals, families and communities (MH)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Identifying different families in their communities, for example 2-parent, single-parent, extended, blended and same-sex families (MH)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Identifying ways they use their strengths when participating in different types of play, games and activities across a variety of settings to help themselves and others to be successful, such as in cooperative play, partner and group physical activities and classroom games (AP, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Recognising the uniqueness of different people in a team and classroom and acknowledging the right for everyone to belong and contribute (MH)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Name parts of the body and describe how their body is growing and changing
Elaboration: Recognising how bodies grow and change over time (RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Name parts of the body and describe how their body is growing and changing
Elaboration: Recording and mapping growth on individual and group growth charts (RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Name parts of the body and describe how their body is growing and changing
Elaboration: Identifying private parts of the body and understanding the contexts in which body parts should be kept private (RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others
Elaboration: Explaining their actions in response to challenging situations in shared play experiences (AP, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others
Elaboration: Practising personal skills, such as expressing needs, wants and feelings, active listening and showing self-regulation, to be an effective group member at home and at school (RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others
Elaboration: Identifying behaviours that are respectful, inclusive and safe during play (MS, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others
Elaboration: Discussing how it feels to be included in activities (AP, HBPA, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others
Elaboration: Exploring personal and social skills through texts and digital media to identify different ways of interacting respectfully (RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify emotions they experience
Elaboration: Identifying and describing the emotions of people who are happy, sad, excited, tired, angry, scared or confused (MH, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify emotions they experience
Elaboration: Learning and using appropriate language and actions to communicate their feelings in different situations (MH, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify emotions they experience
Elaboration: Recalling and sharing emotional responses to different situations and representing these in a variety of ways (MH)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify emotions they experience
Elaboration: Reading and viewing stories about adventures, and talking about how characters feel and react when taking risks or responding to emergencies (MH, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify emotions they experience
Elaboration: Talking about connections between feelings, body reactions and body language (MH, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify emotions they experience
Elaboration: Expressing a variety of emotions and thoughts in a range of situations (MH, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore how to seek, give or deny permission respectfully when sharing possessions, personal space or body autonomy
Elaboration: Recognising that all people have the right to body autonomy: the right to make choices about what others ask them to do with and to their bodies (RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore how to seek, give or deny permission respectfully when sharing possessions, personal space or body autonomy
Elaboration: Identifying and negotiating roles and demonstrating awareness of rights (including body autonomy, sharing possessions and personal space) through guided play experiences (RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore how to seek, give or deny permission respectfully when sharing possessions, personal space or body autonomy
Elaboration: Practising behaviours that show respect for different perspectives and ideas through imaginative and shared play experiences (AP, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore how to seek, give or deny permission respectfully when sharing possessions, personal space or body autonomy
Elaboration: Exploring the importance of asking for permission and giving permission when sharing or negotiating in play, and respecting someone’s right to say no (RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify protective behaviours and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Exploring protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies they can use, such as identifying early warning signs and knowing who they can ask for help when they or others feel unsafe or uncomfortable (MH, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify protective behaviours and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Identifying and naming a support network of adults they can trust to help them if they feel unsafe, uncomfortable or scared, and practising different ways of asking for help in a range of different scenarios (MH, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify protective behaviours and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Identifying situations and spaces that are safe for them and recognising the importance of seeking help from a trusted adult if they feel unsafe, such as while online and when using digital tools or when playing at a park (MH, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify protective behaviours and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Identifying characters in different texts who help the main character to stay safe and healthy (MH, RS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety
Elaboration: Identifying household substances that are dangerous, and explaining what symbols are used to identify the danger (S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety
Elaboration: Identifying and trying a wide range of fruits and vegetables and describing how eating fruits and vegetables makes them feel (FN)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety
Elaboration: Recognising and following safety symbols and procedures to keep themselves and others safe at home and in water and road environments (S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise fundamental movement skills in active play and minor games, in indoor, outdoor and aquatic settings
Elaboration: Applying different locomotor skills to move from one point to another (AP, FMS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise fundamental movement skills in active play and minor games, in indoor, outdoor and aquatic settings
Elaboration: Combining fine and gross motor skills in increasingly complex patterns (AP, FMS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise fundamental movement skills in active play and minor games, in indoor, outdoor and aquatic settings
Elaboration: Propelling, receiving and controlling objects at different levels and in different ways (AP, FMS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise fundamental movement skills in active play and minor games, in indoor, outdoor and aquatic settings
Elaboration: Performing a range of water confidence skills such as floating with a buoyancy aid and putting their face in the water (FMS, LLPA, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise fundamental movement skills in active play and minor games, in indoor, outdoor and aquatic settings
Elaboration: Demonstrating how to transfer weight from one part of the body to another (AP, FMS, RE)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise fundamental movement skills in active play and minor games, in indoor, outdoor and aquatic settings
Elaboration: Responding with movement to rhythm, beat, music and words (FMS, RE)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore different ways of moving their body safely when manipulating objects and moving through space
Elaboration: Suggesting and testing different ways to move in a playing space or different ways to use equipment and objects, and making judgements about which are most effective and which movements and equipment they prefer (AP, FMS, RE)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore different ways of moving their body safely when manipulating objects and moving through space
Elaboration: Participating in games that require them to be aware of personal safety in relation to game boundaries, rules and safe use of equipment (AP, FMS, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore different ways of moving their body safely when manipulating objects and moving through space
Elaboration: Manipulating equipment in a range of different movement situations and tasks, including in minor games, imaginative play and when practising fundamental movement skills (AP, FMS, RE)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore different ways of moving their body safely when manipulating objects and moving through space
Elaboration: Demonstrating spatial awareness when moving around, under, over and through objects and people in indoor and outdoor environments confidently and safely (AP, FMS, RE, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Participate safely in a range of activities in outdoor environments and aquatic settings and explore the benefits of being physically active
Elaboration: Participating in children’s games from Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander cultures, such as the different Yulunga games, and discussing what they enjoyed about these games and similarities to other games (AP, FMS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Participate safely in a range of activities in outdoor environments and aquatic settings and explore the benefits of being physically active
Elaboration: Identifying risks, developing self-regulation and seeking support if required when moving and playing in outdoor environments (AP, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Participate safely in a range of activities in outdoor environments and aquatic settings and explore the benefits of being physically active
Elaboration: Exploring a range of ways to play and be active and participate safely in outdoor environments and aquatic settings (AP, CA, HBPA, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Participate safely in a range of activities in outdoor environments and aquatic settings and explore the benefits of being physically active
Elaboration: Discussing opportunities to be active in spaces in and around their homes (AP, HBPA)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Follow rules to promote fair play and inclusion in a range of physical activities
Elaboration: Identifying and describing actions that would constitute fair play while participating in a range of minor games and activities (AP, FMS, RE, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Follow rules to promote fair play and inclusion in a range of physical activities
Elaboration: Demonstrating how to play fairly in a range of minor games and play situations (AP, FMS, RE, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Follow rules to promote fair play and inclusion in a range of physical activities
Elaboration: Discussing rules of different games that relate to safety, boundaries and appropriate use of equipment (AP, FMS, RE, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Follow rules to promote fair play and inclusion in a range of physical activities
Elaboration: Demonstrating that following rules allows everyone to participate in games and activities (AP, FMS, RE, S)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Cooperate with others when participating in physical activities
Elaboration: Working with a partner or small group to complete a movement task or challenge (AP, FMS, RE)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Cooperate with others when participating in physical activities
Elaboration: Mirroring a partner while moving to music (AP, RE)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Cooperate with others when participating in physical activities
Elaboration: Using words and body language to communicate intentions clearly and respectfully during active play, small-group activities and minor games (AP, FMS, RE, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Cooperate with others when participating in physical activities
Elaboration: Achieving agreed outcomes when participating in physical activities by listening to and cooperating with others (AP, FMS, RE, RS)

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Cooperate with others when participating in physical activities
Elaboration: Practising turn-taking and sharing equipment when participating in play, small-group activities and minor games (AP, FMS, RE, S)
